caption.p: Antiglycation activity and aldose reductase inhibitory activity of the 70% methanol extract of M. volcanica. ( A) Antiglycation activities of the the 70% methanol extract of M. volcanica (IC 50, 21.35 µg/mL) and its positive control aminoguanidine hydrochloride (IC 50, 317.36 µg/mL). ( B) Aldose reductase inhibitory activities of the 70% methanol extract of M. volcanica (IC 50, 1.18 µg/mL) and its positive control quercetin (IC 50, 5.37 µg/mL).
